author: wn.com
title: Record number of civil service job vacancies offered (The Central People's Government of the People's ...
text: ( Source : The Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China ) A record 27,817 civil service jobs are being advertised as demand for city-and county-level staff increases along with a growing retirement trend in the sector.
